titleInfo.title: McKinley High School Oral History Project: Old South Baton Rouge Businesses
titleInfo.subTitle: Barbara LaConta Earthly oral history interview, 1996

name.description: Barbara LaConta Earthly was born in New Orleans on January 20, 1926 to [Morell?] and Helen LaConta. She grew up in South Baton Rouge and attended McKinley High School. She was married to Rev. John Earthly. She passed away in 2013 at age 87.

mods.abstract: Earthly grew up in the vicinity of East Boulevard in South Baton Rouge. She talks about the doctors' offices, grocery and dry goods stores, and clothing stores in the neighborhood. She recalls a decline in local businesses as the business owners passed away, as supermarkets emerged, as integration contributed to flight, and as businesses were sold, closed, or burned down. She reflects on the difference between the close family businesses of the past and the impersonal shop-n-go places of today.
